name: River-mouth Quarter
role_in_state: Primary transshipment hub between ocean trade and inland rivers
economy_niches: reagent handling & bonded storage for maritime trade
culture_adjustments: vessel styles blend seafaring and riverine design
harbor clans hold stronger territorial kinship than inland ports
rituals emphasize quick tide-appeasement before offloading
greater tolerance for itinerant crews and transient labor
apprenticeships include estuary-dredging and shoal-reading skills
constraints: limited bonded warehouse space for reagent stocks
seasonal river closures and variable tidal windowing
guild-controlled berths and quay-fees constrain newcomers
notes: key node for oceanâ†”river cargo transshipment
high seasonal labor influx; apprentices in steady demand
regular dredging and augury used to predict shoaling
